headline: Looking At The Narrative For Paycom Software NYSE PAYC After Mixed Analyst Resets
summary: Why the Paycom price target just nudged lower Paycom Software’s fair value estimate has been revised slightly lower from US$208.71 to US$205.71 per share, reflecting a small increase in the discount rate from 7.16% to 7.19%, while revenue growth assumptions remain broadly stable at 7.96%. This update reflects a more mixed research backdrop, where some analysts maintain a constructive view on the long-term setup, while others highlight a cooler jobs market, softer recent guidance tone, and Q3...

headline: Is Conflicting Wall Street Q4 Views Altering The Investment Case For Paycom Software (PAYC)?
summary: In early January 2026, several Wall Street firms updated their views on Paycom Software ahead of its Q4 2025 results, issuing mixed ratings and commentary on the company’s demand backdrop. The contrasting analyst opinions, particularly around Paycom’s ability to sustain double-digit recurring revenue growth despite recent disappointments, have sharpened investor focus on how well its business model is holding up. Now we’ll examine how this conflicting analyst commentary ahead of Q4...

headline: A Look At Paycom Software (PAYC) Valuation After Prolonged Share Price Weakness
summary: What Paycom’s Recent Performance Might Signal for Investors Without a clear single headline event, interest in Paycom Software (PAYC) today largely centers on how its current share price, recent returns, and fundamentals line up for investors watching the stock. See our latest analysis for Paycom Software. At a share price of $158.94, Paycom’s recent 1 day and 7 day share price returns sit against a weaker 90 day share price return of a 20.74% decline.
